name: Cannondisk
description:
Aim and shoot disks at targets. Disks can bounce off walls and will pass through objects of the same colour. Enjoy! Or don't, it's your life.

Any feedback or vacuous enmity welcome.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/jordio94

Newgrounds version: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/856473

Music Credits
Main theme: Horizon by Verzand
Music: FourPointFour by DSTechnician
Title screen: Space Chillout by penguinmusic
Sound effects: ZapSplat

Thanks for playing!
